mincircle
=========

**Name**:

geom mincircle

**Description**:

Calculate the minimum bounding circle of the input geometry.

**Arguments**:

   * -g --geometry: The input geometry

   * --help : Print help message



**Example**:::

    >>>geom mincircle -g "POLYGON ((0 0, 0 10, 10 10, 10 0, 0 0))" 

    POLYGON ((12.071067811865476 5, 11.935199226610738 3.620503103585285, 11.532814824381884 2.294019499269015, 10.879378012096794 1.0715252080644895, 10 0, 8.92847479193551 -0.8793780120967938, 7.705980500730986 -1.5328148243818829, 6.379496896414715 -1.9351992266107372, 5 -2.0710678118654755, 3.6205031035852855 -1.9351992266107372, 2.2940194992690155 -1.5328148243818829, 1.0715252080644908 -0.8793780120967947, 0 -0.0000000000000009, -0.8793780120967947 1.0715252080644895, -1.5328148243818838 2.2940194992690173, -1.935199226610738 3.620503103585289, -2.0710678118654755 5.000000000000005, -1.9351992266107363 6.379496896414722, -1.5328148243818793 7.705980500730993, -0.8793780120967885 8.92847479193552, 0.000000000000008 10.000000000000007, 1.0715252080644997 10.8793780120968, 2.2940194992690284 11.532814824381887, 3.6205031035853006 11.935199226610742, 5.000000000000018 12.071067811865476, 6.379496896414734 11.935199226610735, 7.705980500731004 11.532814824381875, 8.92847479193553 10.879378012096781, 10.000000000000018 9.999999999999982, 10.879378012096808 8.92847479193549, 11.532814824381893 7.705980500730961, 11.935199226610742 6.379496896414688, 12.071067811865476 5))
